attributes.name: POV
attributes.description: Whose viewpoint is the scene told from? (e.g. 1st person, 2nd person, 3rd person)

attributes.name: Time Period
attributes.description: When does the scene take place? (e.g. present, past, future)

attributes.name: Hook
attributes.description: What will convince the reader to start and keep reading this scene?

attributes.name: Purpose
attributes.description: Why is this scene important to the story? Does it advance the plot or develop characters?

attributes.name: Conflict
attributes.description: What two forces or characters are on opposing sides in this scene?

attributes.name: Climax
attributes.description: How does the scene end, and how does it hook the reader into the next scene?

attributes.name: Character Goals
attributes.description: What does your character want or need to achieve in this scene?

attributes.name: Character Development
attributes.description: How does the character change or develop in this scene?

attributes.name: Sensory Detail
attributes.description: How do the five senses (taste, touch, sight, hearing, smell) impact this scene?
